name: SMS Notification via Twilio
description: Send SMS notification using Twilio service

node.notes: Configure Twilio credentials and verify phone numbers

sms_best_practices: Use for critical alerts requiring immediate attention
Keep messages concise due to SMS character limits
Include essential information only (workflow name, status, timestamp)
Verify phone numbers before sending to avoid delivery failures
compliance: Ensure compliance with SMS regulations in target regions
Monitor delivery rates and failed message handling
Use verified Twilio phone numbers for sending
